Name: Triple A
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: So named due to this drink being flavoured with absinthe, apple and almond.
History: Created in 2010 by Dick Bradsell , London, England
Nutrition: One serving of Triple A contains 180 calories
